newsitem.title: NORWAY: Norway North Sea oil operations return to normal.
newsitem.headline: Norway North Sea oil operations return to normal.

text.p: Offshore crude loadings and production at the North Sea Statfjord and Gullfaks developments was normal on Thursday, operator Den norske stats oljeselskap AS (Statoil) said.
"All loadings are okay, production is normal and the weather is fine," a spokeswoman said.

Loadings and production at the fields, which also take crude from Snorre, Tordis, Vigdis and Statfjord East and North satellites, have been severely disrupted over recent weeks due to hurricane-force winds and high swell.
